contactUs.title: Contact Us — QR Code Generator User Support
contactUs.description: If you have any questions, suggestions, or need assistance — contact our team. We will respond as quickly as possible.
contactUs.agreement: You agree that your data will be used to process your request.

about.title: About QR Code Generator
about.description: Learn more about our service, its features, and our mission. We make QR code generation simple and accessible for everyone.

policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.description: We care about your security and privacy. Read our data processing and privacy policy.
